Class BuildYourOwn

java.lang.Object
rupizza.rupizza.Pizza
rupizza.rupizza.BuildYourOwn
public class BuildYourOwn extends Pizza
Subclass of Pizza that represents Build Your Own Pizza option.
Author:
DONGJIN KIM, HAOPENG LU
